snippet: Maclaren’s Chapter 7 filing follows lawsuits and a recall of a million baby buggies in 2009 after the fingers of 12 children were amputated on the hinges of its foldable model.
abstract: Maclaren’s Chapter 7 filing follows lawsuits and a recall of a million baby buggies in 2009 after the fingers of 12 children were amputated on the hinges of its foldable model.

byline.original: By PETER LATTMAN and ANDREW MARTIN

headline.main: For Stroller Maker, Bankruptcy Is Latest Setback
headline.print_headline: For Stroller Maker, Bankruptcy Is Latest Setback
